staticanalysis

Class SymbolTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • staticanalysis.SymbolTable

  • public class SymbolTable
extends java.lang.Object
    Symbol tables containing class and method signatures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SymbolTable()
      Initialise a new, empty symbol table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • SymbolTable

        public SymbolTable()
        Initialise a new, empty symbol table.

    • Method Detail

      • addClass

        public boolean addClass(java.lang.String id,
                        java.lang.String parent)
        Add a new, empty class signature.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the new class
        parent - the name of the parent class (use null if the class has no parent)
        Returns:
        true if a new class signature was added, false if a class signature with the given name was already present in the symbol table

      • isSubtype

        public boolean isSubtype(Type t1,
                         Type t2)
        Check if type t1 is a subtype of type t2.
        Parameters:
        t1 - the "smaller" type
        t2 - the "bigger" type
        Returns:
        true if t1 is a subtype of t2

      • isSupertype

        public boolean isSupertype(Type t1,
                           Type t2)
        Check if type t1 is a supertype of type t2.
        Parameters:
        t1 - the "bigger" type
        t2 - the "smaller" type
        Returns:
        true if t2 is a subtype of t1

      • checkInheritanceHierarchy

        public void checkInheritanceHierarchy()
                               throws StaticAnalysisException
        Check that the inheritance hierarchy is well-behaved. The following checks are made:
        • The symbol table contains an entry for the parent of each entry which extends a parent
        • There are no cycles in the inheritance hierarchy
        • No ancestor method is overloaded in a descendant
        Throws:
        StaticAnalysisException - if any class names an undefined parent

      • getClassSignature

        public ClassSignature getClassSignature(java.lang.String id)
        Look up a class signature. Use null as the class name to look up the signature for the dummy top-level "class".
        Parameters:
        id - the class name (or null for dummy the top-level class)
        Returns:
        the class signature, or null if no signature exists for the given name

      • classDeclarationIsInScope

        public boolean classDeclarationIsInScope(java.lang.String id)
        Check if a class signature exists for a given class name.
        Parameters:
        id - the class name
        Returns:
        true if the symbol table contains an entry for the given name, false otherwise
